annotations.title: Master The Classics: Mint Julep

textContent:
~.5 oz. -or- ~ 15 ml. Demerara Syrup
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters
8-12 mint leaves
3 oz. -or- 90 ml. Bourbon
.25 oz Jamaican rum (optional)

Muddle syrup and mint then add bourbon and bitters
Fill beaker partway with crushed ice
Swizzle it or stir it
Top it up with ice
add a bouquet of several sprigs of mint
Top with rum
Enjoy.

---

2oz (60ml) Bourbon
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syup
Small Handful of Mint (6-8 leaves)
1 Sugar Cube

build in Julep Chalice
Light muddle to combine sugar and press mint
Add crushed (or pebble) Ice
Light Stir/Swizzle
add snow cone of ice on top
Garnish with a generous bundle of mint
